DOC.brief_summary: This study test Scanadu Urine Device clinical performance usability .
DOC.brief_title: Scanadu Urine Device Validation Study Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study : - Evaluate validate clinical performance Scanadu Urine Device hand intend user compare : visual read chemical test strip perform lab technician utilize Siemens MultistixÂ® 10SG technology ( K905396 ) . - Evaluate validate user-interface Scanadu Urine Device intend user human factor user interface Scanadu Urine Device . - Evaluate reproducibility hand lay-users repeat test sample know test level
DOC.criteria: Female male 18 year old old Pregnant pregnant Must experience use Apple iPhone Have visual impairment Able hold Smart Phone horizontally raise dominant hand Must able read understand English Must provide Informed Consent Has know history visual impairment may affect read navigate Scanadu Urine app Unable void collect urine specimen test Unable hold phone steady ( horizontally ) history tremor condition Parkinson 's disease
